scripts.db:reset: rm -f "$HOME/Library/Application Support/com.jemminger.waid/waid.db" && echo 'Database reset. Restart the app to reseed.'
scripts.version:push: git add package.json src-tauri/tauri.conf.json src-tauri/Cargo.toml src-tauri/Cargo.lock && git commit -m "Bump version to $(node -p 'require("./package.json").version')" && git tag v$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:M: bun run version:bump M && bun run version:push && bun run release
scripts.release:m: bun run version:bump m && bun run version:push && bun run release
scripts.release:p: bun run version:bump p && bun run version:push && bun run release
